mergeSortedStringVectors 
 public static Vector mergeSortedStringVectors(Vector v1,
                                               Vector v2)
Merge two String Vectors into a new Vector. Input vectors must already be sorted in ascending order. Output vector will be sorted in ascending order. Warning: The resulting Vector will be eq to one of the inputs if the other one is null or empty.

sortedStringVectorsIntersect 
 public static boolean sortedStringVectorsIntersect(Vector v1,
                                                    Vector v2)
Determine whether two string Vectors have *any* elements in common. Input vectors must already be sorted in ascending order.
